PHRASE.LANG: The jumptroopers were an air-to-ground attack unit that was trained to engage airborne, entrenched, or otherwise inaccessible enemies. [#Legal]
Les Jumptroopers sont une unité d'attaque aéroterrestre entraînée pour se battre contre des ennemis aériens, retranchés ou autrement inaccessibles.[#Legal]
Die Sprungsoldaten waren eine Luftangriffseinheit, die ausgebildet wurde, um Feinde in der Luft, in Gräben oder an anderen schwer zugänglichen Orten zu bekämpfen.[#Legal]
I soldati jump erano un'unità d'attacco aria-terra addestrata a combattere nemici in volo, trincerati o altrimenti inaccessibili.[#Legal]
Los soldados de salto eran una unidad de ataque aire-tierra entrenada para entablar combate con enemigos aerotransportados, atrincherados o inaccesibles.[#Legal]
The jumptroopers were an air-to-ground attack unit that was trained to engage airborne, entrenched, or otherwise inaccessible enemies. [#Legal]
The jumptroopers were an air-to-ground attack unit that was trained to engage airborne, entrenched, or otherwise inaccessible enemies. [#Legal]
